description: TO ELECT A SPEAKER OF THE HOUSE; CANDIDATES WERE J.N. GARNER, CODED 1; B.H. SNELL, CODED 2; G.J. SCHNEIDER, CODED 5.

TO AMEND H. TO AMEND H. R. 13520 (P. 428), MAKING APPROPRIATIONS FOR THE TREASURY AND POST OFFICE DEPARTMENTS FOR FISCAL 1934, BY ADDING A PROVISION THAT IF EITHER BRANCH OF CONGRESS PASS A RESOLUTION DISAPPROVING OF AN EXECUTIVE ORDER CONSOLIDATING EXECUTIVE BUREAUS, SUCH ORDER SHALL BECOME NULL TO THE EXTENT OF THE DISAPPROVAL. TO RESOLVE INTO THE COMMITTEE OF THE WHOLE TO CONSIDER H. R. 14724 (P. 429), MAKING APPROPRIATIONS FOR THE NAVY DEPARTMENT FOR FISCAL 1934, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.
